script.name: plugin.guilds.createtrades
script.description: Guilds: Create a new set of trades
script.sourceplaintext:
$Guild.Data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' skip if $Guild.Data return [FALSE]
$tGuild = $Guild.Data[$a.guild] skip if $Guild.Data return [FALSE]
if $a.buy $array.data = $Guild.Data['ware.buying'] else $array.data = $Guild.Data['ware.selling'] end
gosub sub.CountGuild
if $a.buy $last.time = $tGuild['last.trade.buy'] else $last.time = $tGuild['last.trade.sell'] end
if $last.time AND $ret.count $current.time = playing time if ( $last.time + 3600 ) > $current.time return [FALSE] end end
if $ret.count < $a.min if not $array.data $array.data = array alloc: size=0 if $a.buy $Guild.Data['ware.buying'] = $array.data else $Guild.Data['ware.selling'] = $array.data end end
gosub sub.GetWare gosub sub.GetRaces
$count = random value from $a.min to $a.max - 1 $count = $count - $ret.count while $count dec $count = gosub sub.CreateTrade end end
$current.time = playing time if $a.buy $tGuild['last.trade.buy'] = $current.time else $tGuild['last.trade.sell'] = $current.time end
return [TRUE]
sub.CountGuild: $ret.count = 0 if $array.data $sub.i = size of array $array.data while $sub.i dec $sub.i = $sub.data = $array.data[$sub.i] $sub.value = $sub.data[4] do if $sub.value == $a.guild inc $ret.count = end end endsub
sub.AddAll: $subtype = get number of subtypes of maintype $maintype while $subtype dec $subtype = $ware = get ware from maintype $maintype and subtype $subtype if not $allow.illegal do if is ware illegal for any race: ware=$ware continue end $ware.flags = get ware flags: ware=$ware if $ware.flags & [WareType.Luxury] continue end $table[$ware] = [TRUE] end endsub
sub.AddFood: $maintype = [SSTYPE_W_FOOD] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.AddMineral: $maintype = [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.AddBio: $maintype = [SSTYPE_W_BIO] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.AddEnergy: $maintype = [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.AddLasers: $maintype = [SSTYPE_LASER] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.AddMissiles: $maintype = [SSTYPE_MISSILE] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.AddShields: $maintype = [SSTYPE_SHIELD] gosub sub.AddAll endsub
sub.GetWare: $table = table alloc if $a.guild == 'merchant' $allow.illegal = [FALSE] gosub sub.AddBio gosub sub.AddMineral gosub sub.AddFood gosub sub.AddEnergy $table[Crystals] = [TRUE] $table[Computer Components] = [TRUE] $table[Quantum Tubes] = [TRUE] $table[Microchips] = [TRUE] else if $a.guild == 'merc' $allow.illegal = [FALSE] gosub sub.AddLasers gosub sub.AddMissiles gosub sub.AddShields $table[Fighter Drone] = [TRUE] end endsub
sub.GetRaces: $tRaces = table alloc $tRaces[Argon] = [TRUE] $tRaces[Boron] = [TRUE] $tRaces[Split] = [TRUE] $tRaces[Paranid] = [TRUE] $tRaces[Teladi] = [TRUE] $tRaces[Privateer] = [TRUE] $unistate = get global variable: name='plot.unistate' do if $unistate != 'reunion' $tRaces[Terran] = [TRUE] endsub
sub.CreateTrade: $ware = get random key: table=$table $race = get random key: table=$tRaces @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.addtrade : Guild=$a.guild Buying?=$a.buy Ware=$ware Qty=null Expire=null Sector/Race=$race Range=null endsub
return null

line.text: get number of subtypes of maintype
is ware illegal for any race: ware=

sval.val: Guilds: Create a new set of trades
